prediction.health: You have to take special precaution regarding drinking fluids because the chances of a waterborne disease are high. Ensure that you drink boiled and clean water.
prediction.emotions: Be careful not to make harsh comments in case you are pushed into an argument. You need to keep your emotions under control. Don’t let anyone take undue advantage of you
prediction.profession: Sudden issues and problems can upset you. Resist associating with people that will harm your reputation. Situations of stress shall prevail; however, you can overcome it with your patience.
prediction.luck: This time is not in your favor; so, do not depend on luck. But continue with your efforts for which you will get results later.
prediction.personal_life: You may have to face misunderstanding with friends and relatives. An innocent distortion of facts could lead to distrust and hurt in a personal relationship. Adopt an attitude of working "with the flow" for best results.
prediction.travel: If possible, cancel all your tours for the time being as they may prove harmful or unfruitful.

prediction.health: You will experience a new burst of energy. You are likely to take up a health regime which you have been putting off for quite some time.
prediction.emotions: You will display a friendly attitude in your speech and demeanor. Your mood and attitude are appeasing. You shall be full of positivity.
prediction.profession: Today is a good day to improve your finances. There is a probability of gaining some unexpected monetary returns. You will get more appreciation at your place of work. You may even be offered an exciting career/business opportunity.
prediction.luck: Your luck will favour you today – especially in matters of wealth and fortune.
prediction.personal_life: You will buy some item of comfort or luxury for your home. Guests may make your evening pleasant and memorable. This would be a perfect day to share your feelings with your partner.
prediction.travel: An opportunity to travel with your colleagues or boss may arise. These trips will prove to be quite beneficial for you.

prediction.health: You will be pink in health. You shall feel robust and have great physical stamina today. Staying fit and healthy should be your priority in the coming days too as it can avoid sudden health problems. It would be smart to embark on a new fitness regime.
prediction.emotions: Your children’s improvement will be the source of your happiness and pride. Today you will try to intertwine business and pleasure.
prediction.profession: Work situation will improve. Your loyalty and hard working nature will get you the due recognition. Business will be very profitable. Monetary gains from investments and real estate are likely. You will get new clients.
prediction.luck: Luck seems to be in your favor today. You can win a lottery or gain in speculation.
prediction.personal_life: Your rapport with those who care about you will be very smooth now. There will be improvement in your personal relationships. Eligible bachelors may get good marriage proposals today. There will be likely monetary gains from in-laws.
prediction.travel: Luck seems to be in your favor today. You can win a lottery or gain in speculation.

prediction.health: You may get to travel new and unexplored places. This trip can be for pleasure or business, but it will be a successful one.
prediction.emotions: Negative thinking may disturb your mind but keep patience, the results will be positive.
prediction.profession: Business persons are advised not to go for risky investments, as they might incur heavy losses. You may have disputes with the partner on money related issues. Today, you may have extra workload - a complex task can be assigned to you in the office.
prediction.luck: You are particularly sensitive and intuitive today and shall react strongly to what people say.
prediction.personal_life: Today you may be upset due to rude behavior of the partner. Have patience and try to avoid making issue of small matters. Some confusion may occur at your home. If you are in trouble due to some personal issues, do not take any action emotionally.
prediction.travel: Rash driving and risk should not be taken while on the road. If you are making plans to travel long distance, then it will be better to postpone it for two to three days.

prediction.health: You will feel active and happy the whole day. Beginning a new physical exercise regime and sporting activity will cause good health. Tendency to suffer from joints and muscular pain exists. However, there are no major health related issues to worry about.
prediction.emotions: This is a time of heightened yet manageable emotions. Increased sensitivity and warmth helps endear you to others.
prediction.profession: This is a good time for making business decisions, investments and dispute settlements. You shall have an edge over competitors. Job interview or negotiations will give good results. It's your time to be recognized and appreciated.
prediction.luck: There are a few pleasant surprises in store for you today. You will be able to achieve immense success even with small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You will be more sympathetic to the feelings of others and shall freely share your own emotions with them. It’s a party time. Enjoy the day with family and friends. You may get an invitation to attend a social gathering.

prediction.health: You will find yourself to be more robust and energetic. You are likely to take up a new natural health program. Eat a well balanced diet to keep yourself in good condition.
prediction.emotions: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.profession: Your creative talents will prove to be highly lucrative if put to proper use. Today can prove to be very productive for you. You will come up with new ideas and strategies. Financial position will be good.
prediction.luck: You are in the best of your moods and wear a carefree attitude for most part of the day. You will feel like taking part in entertaining and fun activities.
prediction.personal_life: Your passionate desires and romantic feelings are very strong now. Someone from your past is likely to contact you and make it a memorable day. Your energy level is high; this is a good time for team activities.

prediction.health: You are going to feel very energetic today. This is a suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. You will be at the best of your physical shape. Group activities will benefit you.
prediction.emotions: You will be positive and optimistic. You shall feel warm connecting with a friend or a group today.
prediction.profession: You will have chances for gaining some unexpected monetary income. Use your specialized knowledge to augment your career prospects. Your good organizational aptitude and cool mental processes will help you to get things done successfully.
prediction.luck: You may get some good news today which will make you happy. Lady Luck will be smiling at your efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You are going to feel very energetic today. This is a suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. You will be at the best of your physical shape. Group activities will benefit you.

prediction.health: Constant sitting in one place may bring you pain in neck and back. Your mind will be stressed too. Meditation can help you deal with this.
prediction.emotions: You will be very short-tempered today. It is advisable that you engage in some vigorous swimming or any sort of physical activity.
prediction.profession: Today is not a very favorable day- so check your financial situation and limit your expenses. You may find yourself running from pillar to post with little fruitful outcome. Do not lose heart. Do not give in to temper.
prediction.luck: Luck is not in your favor today. Things just don’t seem to be working in your favour. Be patient and wait for the right time to come.
prediction.personal_life: You can hurt someone else under an impulse of anger. Don’t be in a rush to take decisions. Differences with siblings will upset you. Avoid using harsh words and try to maintain peace in relationships.
prediction.travel: You may face troubles while making short trips. Chances of getting injured or getting involving in disputes are likely. Travel only if you have to.

prediction.health: Your health shall be excellent. Energy levels and immunity will be high. You shall feel robust and free from any afflictions.
prediction.emotions: You will experience joy and contentment. Your mood will be optimistic and cheerful. You shall feel confident in whatever you do. Your mind shall be free from all worries and anxiety.
prediction.profession: Career wise, today is an excellent day. You will enjoy wonderful gains and success after putting in the requisite efforts and hard work. Your endeavors shall be adequately compensated by financial gains in the end. All your attempts will prove fruitful.
prediction.luck: Today is a very auspicious day for you. Your wishes shall be fulfilled.
prediction.personal_life: You shall enjoy a happy and fulfilling conjugal life. You may experience a spiritual bonding with someone. People will be drawn to you. You shall be able to make an impressionable impact on those around you. You shall gain reputation and status in society.
prediction.travel: Today is a good day for travelling. A visit to a spiritual place will prove to be very fruitful and rejuvenating.

prediction.health: Apart from some minor health issues, you shall enjoy good general health today. You will overcome minor complications if any. This is a good time to embark on a new fitness regime. Keep away from bad habits and vices.
prediction.emotions: Today you shall feel extremely positive and in high spirits. You shall radiate positive energy.
prediction.profession: You will enjoy success in your profession. Profitable opportunities will surface in business. For those in a service, your bosses will reward you for the good work done; a good bonus may be on the way.
prediction.luck: Today is your lucky day. You shall get a sudden windfall gain or an old investment will bring huge profits.
prediction.personal_life: You may meet a new love interest. Pursue this person as this relationship can culminate in marriage. You may buy yourself a new conveyance or some other possession which has been on your wish list for quite some time now. You will win arguments.

prediction.health: Minor health issues shall spoil your mood today. Take care of your health and eat your meals properly. Avoid any exertion. Don't over burden your body with too much activity; instead treat yourself to a day or two of rest.
prediction.emotions: You shall start off well; but as the day moves on, there will be a shift in your mood, making you a bit restless.
prediction.profession: Generally, it is a good day but, be wise in monetary matters. Do not stand surety for anyone. It will land you in trouble. You may find yourself dealing with a difficult individual - someone in business or in a position of authority.
prediction.luck: Luck is not in your favor today. Better refrain from any investments or gambling or you will lose a lot of money.
prediction.personal_life: Avoid confrontations and arguments. Rift with your loved ones is possible. Do not allow the conflict to develop: compromise before things get out of hand. Control your temper. In certain situations you will find it difficult to deal with others and this will result in you feeling rather stressed.
prediction.travel: Safeguard your valuables and documents while travelling.

prediction.profession: This is an excellent time on professional front. Today you can take any decision and can start any new project independently. There are strong chances of financial gains from unexpected sources. Appreciation and recognition will also bring along new opportunities.
prediction.luck: Today will be a day of fortune for you. You are free to take any decisions and start new projects.
